summary: This is an immersive ENB ment for gameplay ( No pitchblack nights). The goal is to give skyrim a fantasy-feel without losing too much realism.
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://s8.postimage.org/x9znsdt05/fantastic_ENB.jpg[/img]
Fantastic ENB 1.0

This is an immersive ENB ment for gameplay ( No pitchblack nights). The goal is to give skyrim a fantasy-feel without losing too much realism. ( No Bloom overuse )

[color=red]Please download http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v121212.htm to use with this one. [/color]->[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v121212.htm]CLICKETYCLICK[/url]<-

There are 2 files to download, one for Vanilla Skyrim and one for those of you who use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802] Climates of Tamriel[/url].
The CoT version looks good but i preffer to play without it. ( All screenshots are taken with the vanilla version )

[b]There is now an optional file with different depth of field ( camera blur ) to choose from.
There are 3 different types of dof, or none. Click image to see examples! :-)[/b]

[url=http://postimage.org/image/s8k4jg623/][img]http://s1.postimage.org/s8k4jg623/Dofexamples_SMALL.jpg[/img][/url]


If you use the Vanilla version of this ENB, please check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17609] Relighting Skyrim [/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4323209]NovakDalton[/url]. It makes Skyrim look so much better.

[color=Yellow][b] Feel free to submit screenshots from your game using this ENB. Or drop a comment and let me know what you think of it. [/color][/b]

[b][u]INSTALLATION[/b][/u]
-Download the file provided [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v121212.htm]here[/url].
-Extract the file anywhere, and copy \"d3d9.dll\" from the \"Wrapperversion\"-folder to your Skyrim main folder.
-Download one of the \"Fantastic ENB\" files.
-Extract anywhere
-Copy preferred version to your Skyrim main folder
-Enjoy :-) 

( Remember to set \"bFloatPointRenderTarget=1\" in \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\" or ENB won\'t work. )


Credit goes to:
[url=http://www.enbdev.com/] ENB[/url] by Boris Vorontsov

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26053]BETTER THAN REAL[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1005590]CandyRay[/url]
author: majk360
